name: Lady of the Hill
description:
You are a guardian of the mountain and the forest. Your mission is to protect the flora and fauna that inhabits there. 

You have to fight the Urban Sprawl that is decimating the forest and killing the wildlife. Destroy buildings, grow giant, and fight the city’s patron god. 

Use A S D W to move, Space to jump, P for Pause/Menu and Left click to attack. Move the camera with the mouse.

Link to business model: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_2QwNpPEALRWntwk3p54kEMNJ1aNO5Qm/view

Music: Mathew Pablo (2011). https://opengameart.org/content/heroic-demise-updated-version
